home.title: Real time dashboard and analytics
home.description: F1 Telemetry is a real-time telemetry dashboard so you can follow Formula 1 completely and from anywhere, without needing to watch the broadcast.
home.mapDesc: Real-time preview of the live map.
home.audioDesc: Listen instantly to each driver’s team radio during the race—we also use AI for translation and transcription!
home.circlesDesc: We keep adding features to boost race analysis, such as the Circle of Doom, perfect for undercut decisions.
home.version: Version 1.4.3 includes a new header with two options: simple and detailed. We also fix some bugs.

footer.legal: This website is not associated, affiliated, authorized, endorsed, or officially connected in any way with Formula 1, the FIA, or any of its subsidiaries or affiliates.

schedule.title: Schedule
schedule.description: F1 Telemetry schedule page with upcoming sessions and race calendar.

liveTiming.title: Live timing
liveTiming.description: Real-time F1 telemetry dashboard with live timing, driver positions, lap times, and race analytics. Follow Formula 1 races with detailed data.

map.title: Live map
map.description: F1 Telemetry live map of the Formula 1 race circuit.

announce.error: Team radio transcriptions are currently in development.

tourSteps.welcome: Welcome! With this tutorial we're going to show you the telemetry features.
tourSteps.positions: Here you can see the current positions, compounds and pit history, differences in seconds, lap times and mini sectors.
tourSteps.map: This map shows the real-time location of each driver on the circuit during the session.
tourSteps.raceControl: Here you'll see race control messages, that is flags and penalties.
tourSteps.laps: Next to the messages are the laps and the current state of the circuit.
tourSteps.header: In the header you can see the session status, view weather conditions and the time to sync.
tourSteps.raceLogs: You can also listen to audios, read their transcriptions or the session message history.
tourSteps.doomCircle: The Circle of Doom helps you visualize pit stop strategies and undercut decisions in real-time. When a driver enters the pit they will be delayed until the PIT mark
tourSteps.carDataCircle: This circle shows real-time data from the selected driver, such as speed, RPM and more.
tourSteps.preferences: IMPORTANT: This is the preferences panel, you can customize the telemetry here. Enjoy!
